special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Naxene is a 6th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield

special_abilities.name: Roleplaying Information.
descriptions: Goldenfields' crops are vital Waterdeep's survival, which is why the Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors sent Naxene to make sure the temple-farm is adeuately defended. At first she regarded the task as a punishment, but now she appreciates the peace and quiet.
Ideal: "There's no problem that can't be solved with magic."
Bond: "I have great respect for Lady Laeral Silverhand of Waterdeep. She and the Lords' Alliance are going to bring some much-needed order to this lawless land."
Flaw: "I'm too smart to be wrong about anything."

actions.name: Staff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
